{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC7901WBR |revision=A2 (B1 ANZ) |asin= |fcc_date=07/27/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=HGA3401RRN |manuf_rev=-FLF-17 |availability=now |type=access point, dsl modem |fcc_id=HEDSMC7901WR |us_id=1KRDL01BSMC7901WR |pcb_id=142000000007A |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8671BH;RTL8671BH, 91A95QE, G907 TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN25F32-100HIP |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6IH-6 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8187SU;RTL8187SU, 85A54S2 G823C; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=ADSL2+ Analog Front End;Realtek;RTL8271B;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=SMCAP |default_ssid_regex=^SMCAP$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=smcadmin |oui=00:26:F3 |oui_eth=00:26:F3 }} {{TagLine|ADSL2/2+ Barricade G Wireless Modem Router}}
"P/N: 142000000007A REV: 0B" appears to be silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos.
Default settings in this entry are per the FCC manual.
